name: mistral-spell-checker
title: Mistral Spell Checker
description: A Raycast extension to check and correct spelling and grammar using Mistral AI.
author: lucas_marandat

commands.name: mistralSpellChecker
commands.title: Mistral Spell Checker
commands.description: Check and correct spelling and grammar in selected text using Mistral AI.

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: Mistral API Key
preferences.description: Your API key for Mistral AI (required).

preferences.name: model
preferences.title: AI Model
preferences.description: The AI model to use for spell checking (optional).

preferences.name: endpoint
preferences.title: API Endpoint
preferences.description: The API endpoint to use for spell checking (optional).

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
